kpi.name: M8013C13

kpi_info.title: eNB initiated transitions to ECM-IDLE due to Normal release
kpi_info.use: The number of eNB-initiated transitions from the ECM-CONNECTED to ECM-IDLE state due to "User Inactivity" or "Redirect". The UE-associated logical S1-connection is released. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP: UE Context Release Request from the eNB to MME with the following release causes:

kpi.kpi_alias: eNB initiated transitions to ECM-IDLE due to Normal release
